notes.market_cat: Categorical — load market_categories.json, pass as pd.Categorical
notes.qty_rolling_14d_log: np.log1p(14-day rolling avg arrivals) — use market median if unknown
notes.rain_7d_rolling: 7-day rolling rain sum — approximate from forecast if unknown
notes.harvest_signal: max(0, cos(2*pi*(month-11)/12))  — smooth harvest intensity, peaks Nov
notes.monsoon_signal: max(0, cos(2*pi*(month-7)/12))   — smooth monsoon intensity, peaks Jul
notes.summer_signal: max(0, cos(2*pi*(month-4)/12))   — smooth summer intensity, peaks Apr
notes.market_price_trend: linear slope (Rs./day) of last 90-day price window for that market
notes.quarter_REMOVED: intentionally excluded — caused Feb→Mar cliff (integer step Q1→Q2)
notes.price_lag_7: modal_price 7 calendar days ago — see price_lags_latest.csv
notes.price_lag_30: modal_price 30 calendar days ago — see price_lags_latest.csv
notes.market_month_median: historical median for market x month — see market_month_medians.csv
notes.price_spread: max_price - min_price — use market median if unknown
